title: Sony DVD player / Electronic display faces - help appreciated!
content:
Hi

I am working on a type-based video identity, and would love to know if anyone has seen a typeface akin to this image - otherwise I guess I will have to make up a font!

This is a photo of my DVD player display.

thanks for your time!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [dvd-display.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017011624/http:/typophile.com/files/dvd-display.gif) | 62.05 KB |
author: mvor

comments.content:
Thanks Dave - doesnt look like any of these are exactly right, but thanks... Club 21 have a fairly accurate LCD font too, but none of the fonts I find look convincing for this particular application...

[http://www.faces.co.uk/fonts/fontview.cfm?productsku=CB3012](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017011624/http:/www.faces.co.uk/fonts/fontview.cfm?productsku=CB3012 "http://www.faces.co.uk/fonts/fontview.cfm?productsku=CB3012")
